name: R.A.T.9 Mouse -Linux Configuration
tagline: Xorg, evdev, set up, multi buttons, CYBORG R.A.T.9 mouse, linux
body:
### Welcome to '[R.A.T.9](http://www.cyborggaming.com/prod/rat9.htm) Mouse' Xorg server & evdev configuration for Linux. ###About Due to terrible lack of support from evdev/Xorg in Linux for R.A.T.9 Mouse I decided to write my own evdev settings & configs for it.
Actually there is a few well known problems with this mouse series, starting from:
* most keys is not binded properly at all;
* 'horizontal wheel' is not working;
* short battery lifespan; * 'program buttons' are a terrible issue;
* 'aiming button' is only for decoration.
To read the configuration HowTo press "View on GitHub Button" (top) or [follow this link here](https://github.com/lostin8/cyborg-mouse).

Regards; [@r_kruk](https://twitter.com/kruk_co)
